item.title: Creating an Interactive UK Official Charts Data App with Streamlit and Neo4j
item.description: I recently came across Streamlit, a tool that makes it easy to build data based single page web applications. I wanted to give it a try, and the UK Charts QuickGraph that I recently wrote about seemed like a good opportunity for that. This blog post starts from where we left off. The data is loaded into Neo4j and we’ve written some queries to explore different aspects of the dataset.
